title: Do you will like Decentraland have his own clock?
body:
> by 0x919c0e02cab272b50d0cfa2c70a653ce96f589a6 (Tei)

As the proposal just before this one, was a good idea, i wanted to talk about it.

For the events, we always talk about UTC clock, but why Decentraland would not

have his own clock?

You can come from Holland, Brazil, Japon, Russia, Canada, from everywhere on the

planet with the same hour.

Proposal for an unic clock for everybody in DCL on the main board as the

map location or avatar or chat.

- YES
- NO


**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.org/en/proposal/?id=899ad700-d8f7-11eb-9110-69b867ba991b)**
author: 0x5E23D08324f017d5425e59A2782C9ae27aCE0958
